response.original_title: LILIUM-リリウム 新約少女純潔歌劇-
response.overview: “There are no flowers that bloom eternally; even the most beautiful blooms wither away.”  A sanatorium deep in a rainy forest. Known as “The Clan,” it is a sanatorium where vampire boys and girls in their Cocoon period (puberty in humans) lived while they recuperated. A girl, Sylvatica, disappears from the Clan. Her friend Lily searches for her, but none of her friends in the sanatorium remember her. Is Sylvatica a figment of Lily’s imagination? Lily is filled with doubt, but she learns that a girl named Snow remembers Sylvatica. Also, a boy named False begins to approach Lily. When the girls’ secrets are revealed, the door to a cruel fate opens…
response.title: LILIUM-リリウム 新約少女純潔歌劇-
